title: AIDS and VD prevention programme for newly resettled civilians in Thalaiady
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma Pix by: Sri Lanka Army Sri Lanka Army 55 Division Headquarters of Veththalaikerny organized a one day medical workshop recently to educate newly resettled civilians in the Thalaiady area on AIDS, HIV and other venereal diseases (VD). The programme was aimed at civilians and school children in Thalaiady area….
